2013.heading: Early Beginnings
events: Conner graduates from Enumclaw High School, heads to Linfield College
Carlee finishes freshman year, starts her first year of Residence Life

2014.heading: First Contact
events: Conner starts his first year of Residence Life
Carlee and Conner meet for the first time!
Both laugh at "ResLife Couples" statistic

2015.heading: Linfield Tenure
events: Carlee and Conner put in time with Residence Life
Busting Residents for pot together was a highlight
Both return for a final year

2016.heading: Half Post-grad
events: Both Conner and Carlee finish their last years as Residence Advisors
Carlee graduates from Linfield
Carlee promptly starts dating Conner who is still at school
Carlee has a brief job at Domaine Serene, moves up to working as a writer at Master Plans

2017.heading: Full Post-grad
events: Conner graduates from Linfield, starts job as a Software Engineer at Connective DX
Carlee and Conner move in together

2018.heading: Year of Milestones
events: Carlee and Conner visit Disneyland together with Sandra in tow. Everyone survives
Furniture was bought together
Misty the Cat was adopted

2019.heading: More Recently...
events: Carlee and Conner get quietly engaged
They decide to upgrade from an Apartment to a Townhouse at the same time
Conner leaves his job at Connective DX

2020.heading: The Current Year
events: Carlee and Conner (hopefully) get married on September 20th, 2020
They adopt another kitty? Who knows
We don't know the future
